definition[0]: a robust person is strong and healthy
example[0]: a robust man of six feet four
definition[1]: a robust system, organization etc is strong and not likely to have problems
example[1]: The formerly robust economy has begun to weaken.
definition[2]: a robust object is strong and not likely to break
example[3]: a typically robust performance by the prime minister
definition[4]: robust food or flavours have a good strong taste
